251674.「……水温よし。\n しびれくらげの姿も……見えないな。:
...water temperature good. No Man o' War in
sight....

251675.「ムーロンさん。問題なさそうっス！: Mr. Muron. Looks like we're good to go!

251676.「まどろっこしいのは ナシだぜ。\n スリルとロマンスの夏は 唐突に始まる……。:
No need to be a slacker. The summer of thrills
and romance begins abruptly...

251678.「この夏 最大の青春が\n 大グチ開けて 待ってるってなぁ！:
The greatest youth of this summer is waiting
for you with its big mouth open!

251679.「よぉーっし！ お前たち！\n お待ちかね 海開きの時間だぞぉっ！:
Yo, guys! Hey you guys! You've been waiting
for me. It's time to open the sea!

251692.「このワタシが来たからには ノープロブレム…… \n サメだろうが アメだろうが:
I'm here now, so it's no problem... sharks or
turtles, I'm ready to rock and roll! I'll get
you, I'll get you!

251693.「わあっ！\n サメバーンを 帰らせるための\n 秘密兵器が できたんですねっ！:
Wow! We have a secret weapon to bring
Sharkburn home!

251694.「おうともよ！\n サイッコーのブツが できちまった。\n さっそく ドハデなフ:
Oh, yeah! I've got the perfect thing for you.
Let's fire off some serious fire right now!

251696.「これで サメバーンを 追い払えるのかって？\n ……大丈夫。この花火が 終わる:
You're asking me if this is going to get rid
of Sharkburn? Don't worry. It will be gone by
the time the fireworks are over.

251697.「昔むかし とある深海に \n サメバーンのお姫様が いました。:
Once upon a time, there was a Sharkburn
princess in the deep sea.

251699.「おだやかだけど 退屈な深海で 生まれ育った \n サメバーンのお姫様。ある時:
The princess of Sharkburn was born and raised in the calm but boring depths of the ocean. One day, a mermaid friend tells her about life
on earth.

251700.「地上の人々は 夏になると 海に出て \n いろいろな 楽しいことをして\n 夏:
People on earth go to the sea in the summer
and enjoy summer by doing various fun things.

251701.「わたしも 地上の夏を 楽しみたい！\n ……そう思った お姫様は\n 海に住む:
I want to enjoy summer on earth, too! ...so
the princess visited the witch who lived in
the sea.

251702.「魔女は 人間に変身できる薬を くれました。\n ただし それは飲んだ者が 願い:
The witch gave her a potion that could transform her into a human. However, it was a potion that would only allow the drinker to
return to his or her original form if he or she made a wish.

251703.「人間に変身した お姫様は 願いどおり\n ビーチで 夏を満喫しようとしました。:
The princess, transformed into a human, wanted
to enjoy the summer on the beach as she
wished. But...

251704.「みんなには内緒で こっそり 出かけたせいで\n 臣下のサメバーンたちが 姫を探:
Because she had sneaked out without telling anyone, her subjects, the Sharkburn Princesses, had come to the beach in search of
her.

251705.「事情を説明しようにも 人間の姿では\n サメバーンの仲間たちと 言葉が 通じま:
The princess is at a loss to explain the situation, but in her human form she is unable to communicate with her Sharkburn companions.
The princess is at a loss.

251706.「そんな時 お姫様は とても親切な旅人と \n 出会いました。旅人は ５色の真珠:
Then the princess met a very kind traveler.
The traveler collected five colored pearls and
showed the princess the fireworks.

251707.「生まれてはじめて見た 花火は \n うっとりするほど キレイで……\n お姫様:
The princess enjoyed the summer to the fullest
thanks to the travelers.

251708.「……<pc>みたいな 人がいるなら\n このまま 人間として暮らすのも\n い:
...I thought that if there is a person like
<pc>, I might as well continue to
live as a human...

251709.「遠い 遠い 深海から\n わざわざ 探しにきてくれた みんなを\n 置いていけ:
I can't leave everyone who came all the way
from the deep sea, far, far away, to look for
me. So...

251710.「……サメバーンたちが 引き上げていくぞ！: ...Sharkburn and the others are pulling up!

251711.<center>夢のような時間を ありがとう……。: Thank you for a dreamy time...

251712.「……水温よし。\n サメバーンの姿も……見えないな。:
...water temperature good. No sign of
Sharkburn either...not that I can see.

251713.「ムーロンさん。\n どうやら 問題なさそうっス！: Mr. Muron. Looks like we're in the clear!

251714.「ちょっとしたアクシデントは あったが…… \n 夏のロマンスに 障害はつきもの:
There were a few hiccups, but hey, summer
romances are bound to have hiccups.

251716.「この夏 最大の青春が\n 大グチ開けて 待ってるってなぁ！:
The greatest youth of this summer is waiting
for you with its big mouth open!

251717.「よぉーっし！ お前たち！\n 待たせて 悪かったな！\n 今度こそ 海開きの時:
Yo, guys! Hey, guys! Sorry for keeping you
waiting! Now it's time to open the sea!

262998.「こうして 願いをかなえ サメバーンの姿に\n 戻ることができた お姫様は 仲間:
The princess was granted her wish and returned to her Sharkburn form, and she and her companions returned to the deep sea. And so,
the princess and her companions returned to the deep sea.
